note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Titanium Developer Resources
body:
### Titanium 3rd party resources list
This list pretends to be a comprehensive resource of Appcelerator's Titanium modules, helpers, Frameworks, external tools, etc. either Open Source or closed source, paid or free.


## Development tools
* iOS + Android
  * [TiShadow](https://github.com/dbankier/TiShadow) Instant deployment to iOS & Android devices + Jasmine tests

## Modules

### Imaging
* Android
  * [ImageAsResized](https://github.com/yagitoshiro/ImageAsResized)
  * [jpegencoder](https://github.com/novelys/titanium-jpegencoder)
* iOS
  * [Titanium imaging](https://github.com/gudmundurh/titanium-imaging) 
  * [jpgcompressor](https://github.com/sideshowcoder/jpgcompressor)

### Mapping
* iOS
  * [benCoding.Map](https://github.com/benbahrenburg/benCoding.Map) PolygonOverlay functionality + Ti.Map fork

### Notifications
* iOS
  * [LocalNotify](https://github.com/benbahrenburg/LocalNotify) Substitution for Ti Notifications. No need to schedule notifications in backgroundMode.
